title: This is your stop! (April 2006)
brief_description: A trip through time and space: from ancient Egypt to the wild, wild west. This green screen workshop was produced as part of the G.A.T.E.ways (gifted and talented education) program for kids. The year 6 students learnt scripting, production and performance skills using virtual set technology.
